comments:
This does not seen to lead to any bad behavior, but occurrs frequently:

[2005-09-06,
15:54:2]  version: update@plugins/org.eclipse.ui.workbench_3.1.0.jar, Status
ERROR: org.eclipse.mylar.core code=0 
 org.eclipse.jdt.core.compiler.InvalidInputException:
Invalid_Char_In_String, exception: org.eclipse.jdt.core.compiler.InvalidInputException:
Invalid_Char_In_String
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.util.PublicScanner.getNextToken(PublicScanner.java:1238)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.computeProjectionRanges(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:642)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.computeAdditions(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:121)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.computeAdditions(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:581)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.computeAdditions(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:585)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.computeAdditions(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:585)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.computeAdditions(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:571)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider.processDelta(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:784)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.AutoFoldingStructureProvider$ElementChangedListener.elementChanged(AutoFoldingStructureProvider.java:210)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.DeltaProcessor$3.run(DeltaProcessor.java:1432)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1044)

Not sure how frequent this is after all, and it's in copied code.  Lowering priority until
we redo the folding support and try to avoid this copied code.
Use API from the following: bug 112586
Moving to next release since too many higher priority items came in.
Another key related problem is that folding isn't on in any of the automatically opened editors.
